title: Goli Nutrition Ashwagandha Gummies | The Healthy Place
description: Enjoy the benefits of ashwagandha with Goli Nutrition Ashwagandha Gummies, a formula that promotes a healthy response to stress.
cleaned_text: out of stock but is available for pre-order. Pre-orders will be charged once the item is back in stock. 60 gummies Enjoy the benefits of ashwagandha with Goli Nutrition Ashwagandha Gummies, a formula that promotes a healthier response to stress while promoting better energy levels. - Made with powerful ashwagandha extract - Supports healthy stress response* - Promotes healthy cardiovascular functions* - Promotes a balanced immune response* - Organic, Vegan, Non-GMO - Does not contain yeast, wheat, milk, eggs, gluten, soy, gelatin, peanuts, shellfish, dairy, artificial sweeteners, artificial colors, artificial flavors, agave, artificial preservatives and salicylates Goli Nutrition Ashwagandha Gummies Are you feeling like it's getting more difficult for you to unwind at the end of the day? Are those long days taking a greater toll than before? It's time for you to reclaim your day! Goli Nutrition Ashwagandha Gummies are here to let you unwind while also giving you the energy boost you need, even on the most stressful of days. - Withanolide-rich formula - Promotes balanced cortisol levels* - Made with KSM-66® ashwagandha extract - USDA certified organic ingredients So, what is ashwagandha and how does it help your energy levels? Ashwagandha is an ancient root used for over 3000 years in Ayurveda alternative medicine. It has been used for thousands of years as a solution to combat stress and improve energy levels.* Ashwagandha is a powerful adaptogen and it's loaded with withanolides that support a healthy inflammatory response in the body. This powerful extract also promotes healthy insulin sensitivity and helps balance cortisol levels in your body.* Goli Nutrition Ashwagandha Gummies is made with the powerful KSM-66® which is the highest concentration of ashwagandha extract currently in the market, ensuring you enjoy the full benefits that ashwagandha has to offer. Enjoy a new sense of calm and relaxation while maintaining healthy energy levels with Goli Nutrition Ashwagandha Gummies today! Suggested Use: Take 2 gummies, twice daily. Cautions: Keep out of the reach of children. Consult a physician before taking this product if you are pregnant, nursing, taking any medications, or have a medical condition. Questions? We've got answers! Click the LiveChat button in the lower right hand side of your screen to start talking with one of our Wellness Consultants or [ call one of our stores](https://findyourhealthyplace.com/contact/) to speak with a member of our team.
